Q_DESC:
In an application entry slip the admission cell of Educational Institute seeks basic details. 

In which dad has to tell his name, mother name also his son's counselling cut off marks. 

Display all the details using sub class object by Interface Concept.

Note:

1. Create an Interface named "Student" and declare methods getDetails() and displayDetails()  of void return type and has no arguments

2. Create a class "StudentDetails" that implement "Student" interface and the methods of the interfaces

3. Create instance in the main class for "StudentDetails" as "sd" that invokes the methods in the "StudentDetails" class
TESTCASE_5:
class StudentDetails implements Student
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
interface Student
